game_description: Desperate: Vladivostok is a Bullet Hell VR action filled game with furious fights and adrenaline induced shootouts accompanied by dynamic music. Dive into the criminal history of a hired killer in the post-Soviet cyberpunk entourage and fight with him all the way 'til the bitter end. - Reactive gameplay experience - hit, shoot, and dodge in over 50 hand-crafted scenes of a furious combat puzzle. - Take the lead on the global leaderboards fighting across multiple arenas to dynamic music and fend off endless waves of enemies. - Become the central actor in an assassin's criminal story during the setting of post-Soviet cyberpunk due to well-developed dialogue and comics.
review_1: The Arena mode is fun, if a little hard. The gun mechanics are quite good, but the arm to arm combat isn't great. Throwing things that land miles away from the enemy seems to kill them anyway. Screen glitches every now and again and the gameplay is nowhere near as smooth as similar games like this on the Oculus. Haven't really delved too deeply into the story mode, but the arena mode is a lot of fun, but as I said before, it starts off quite difficult, but perhaps with practice it'll become easier. Has potential to be a 5/5 game, but it's not quite there yet!
review_2: Stunning cell shaded graphics give this game a unique look Added to it fast paced gameplay makes it a top contender and a must have game Challenging and addictive gameplay will keep you wanting one more turn Martin76x
review_3: Desperate Vladivostok is made by MiroWin the creators of Federation 77. This is another amazingly made game with a crazy story and an amazing gameplay loop. This is a must have if your a fan of bullet hell games! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7iuPGkyGEcE
review_4: Amazing fast arcade shooter with intense combat, amazing styled graphics, and lengthy single player mode with added arena mode.
review_5: I have played about 6 hours all in the story mode it's fun but challenging you will die get used to it but you get better after time playing. And I'm pretty sure this is the first A.rated game on quest 2. Give it a try if you like games like super hot you might enjoy this one.
